title: unesco_heritage_Historic_Quarter_of_the_City_of_Colonia_del_Sacramento
text:
Name: Historic Quarter of the City of Colonia del Sacramento. short_description:

Founded by the Portuguese in 1680 on the RÃ­o de la Plata, the city was of strategic importance in resisting the Spanish. After being disputed for a century, it was finally lost by its founders. The well-preserved urban landscape illustrates the successful fusion of the Portuguese, Spanish and post-colonial styles.
